title: Yurugu: An African-Centered Critique of European Cultural Thought and Behavior
description: Yurugu removes the mask from the European facade and reveals the inner workings of global white supremacy, a system that functions to guarantee the control of Europe and her descendants over the majority of the world's peoples. Examines the influence of European culture on the formation of modern institutional frameworks, through colonialism and imperialism, from an African perspective.
author: Marimba Ani
